item.title: [Data Visualization] Exploratory data analysis
item.description: Exploratory data analysis(EDA) In statistics, exploratory data analysis (EDA) is an approach to analyzing data sets to summarize their main characteristics, often with visual methods. The objectives of EDA are to: Suggest hypotheses about the causes of observed phenomena Assess assumptions on which statistical inference will be based Support the selection of appropriate statistical tools and techniques Provide a basis for further data collection through surveys or experiments

item.title: [Machine Learning] Resources for CS229 - Machine Learning
item.description: https://stanford.edu/~shervine/teaching/cs-229.html 一位使丹佛大學的 Data Science track of the Computational and Mathematical Engineering department 研究生, Shervine, 在 Machine learning 的課程中所準備的相關資料. Probabilities and Statistics refresher Linear Algebra and Calculus refresher Deep Learning cheatsheet Supervised Learning cheatsheet Unsupervised Learning cheatsheet Machine Learning tips and tricks cheatsheet https://github.com/afshinea/stanford-cs-229-machine-learning
